channel.title: CVE Feed for Toast Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Toast Plugins -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-33646|2024-04-29T04:57:12.121Z -- Toast Plugins -- Sticky Anything
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Toast Plugins Sticky Anything allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Sticky Anything: from n/a through 2.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-30551|2024-03-31T19:56:16.358Z -- Toast Plugins -- Sticky Anything
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Toast Plugins Sticky Anything.This issue affects Sticky Anything: from n/a through 2.1.5.
